column4: Inbound Nicholasville Rd at Larkin Rd
column5: The right lane is blocked.  Possible medical incident.

column4: The I-275 East and West exit ramps to I-75S in Erlanger are shutdown for several hours due to an overturned tanker.
Westbound traffic should take I-75N to Exit 186/Buttermilk Pike and re-enter I-75S.
Eastbound traffic should take Exit 4/KY-212 to Donaldson Rd to I-75S.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: Details, detours, and updates from the KY Transportation Cabinet.
